pages.text: $(n)There are 3 different potion types:$() $(br)$(li)Potion $(br)$(li)Splash Potion $(br)$(li)Lingering Potion

pages.title: Potion
pages.text: $(item)Potions$() can be used by pressing and holding use, similarly to eating food. $(br)Upon using, they apply the corresponding status effect to the $(thing)Player$().

pages.title: Splash Potion
pages.text: $(item)Splash Potions$() are thrown by using them. $(br2)On impact they explode, applying status effects to nearby entities.

pages.title: Lingering Potion
pages.text: $(item)Lingering Potions$() are thrown, like $(item)Splash Potions$(), by using them. $(br2)On impact they explode, creating a cloud. $(br2)The cloud is made of the potion particles corresponding to the potion that was thrown.
